title: Can ambient music be popular in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes. In the most stressful year of most of our lives, ambient music should be popular. In fact, I believe there are many calm music apps that are trending in the AppStore? And meditation is really in at the moment, so perhaps it already is popular. Earlier this year I found an album designed to chill out cats and…I’ve never felt so calm. Kind of worried me because I’m not a cat but hey, music is music. Ambient music is definitely making it’s way into popularity, but I find it unlikely that an ambient piece would ever make it onto radio 1 or the billboard top 100. Imagine radio stations playing ambient music, imagine the car crashes 😳
